title: Developing Science Education Competencies Through the Student-Teacher Program (SaT) in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary educational principles and intermediate-level expertise in scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive program for corporate managers/leaders to develop scientifically literate educational competencies, designed for limited-technology environments (primarily smartphones)

learning_goals: One can design a science education plan by applying the principles of adult learning
One can develop a 15-minute science education module utilizing activity-based learning (Active Learning) strategies
Through peer assessment and feedback, one can diagnose at least two issues arising during educational implementation and propose improvements

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
